attributes.action: government should have paid our mortgages not banks
attributes.additional_details:
PLEASE COPY IN BROWSER THEN SIGN THANKS
http://www.thesun.co.uk/sol/homepage/news/money/2757724/Bank-bail-out-costs-14k-per-man-in-the-UK.html

The government should have given mortgage borrowers the man and women taxpayers 40 grand to pay our mortgages then we could have spent our repayments on the high street this would have kick started the economy the banks would have got 40 grand repayed of all our mortgages  so getting there money back to re lend  also could have took lower income jobs as repayments would have been more easy to manage we could have bought british and euro goods helping our manufacturing this was our money you gave away that was stealing please sign petitiotion to get our money  knocked of our mortgages 40 grand per household for united kingdom nationals the banks should repay us
